details:
io_uring: fail cancellation for EXITING tasks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.6 by commit 3d2a1e68fd9904fdc1b02f2e7d40ca47df7ba39f, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 89b263f6d56e683ddcf7643140271ef6e36c72b9. For more details please see the references link.
summary: io_uring: fail cancellation for EXITING tasks
